entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:17 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:17 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:17 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
